document_data.name: Sternwell
document_data.mainbody: '''Sternwell''' was the uncle of [[Kroyce Tefoco]], the spouse of [[Oliver Tefoco]], the proprietor of the [[Beehive Goods and Wares]] general store in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] threatened Baldur's Gate's safety, Kroyce Tefoco took the youngest kids, [[Hemjax Tefoco|Hemjax]], [[Maggie Tefoco|Maggie]], and others to the town of [[Beregost]], to live with Uncle Sternwell, away from the threat of war. Sternwell cleaned up his shearing shed for the family lo live in.
